pr_title: HIVE-24143: Include convention in JDBC converter operator in Calcite …

timeline.message: HIVE-24143: Include convention in JDBC converter operator in Calcite plan

timeline.bodyText: Curious as to why this changed?
timeline.author: vineetgarg02
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7,43 +6,43 @@ CREATE TEMPORARY FUNCTION dboutput AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.contrib.genericudf
 
 FROM src
 SELECT
-dboutput ('jdbc:derby:;databaseName=${system:test.tmp.dir}/test_derby_auth1;create=true','user1','passwd1',
+dboutput ('jdbc:derby:;databaseName=${system:test.tmp.dir}/test_derby_auth1_1;create=true','user1','passwd1',

replies.bodyText: I changed it to avoid a clash with other test in the temp directory, which I believe was causing HIVE-23910.
replies.author: jcamachor

timeline.bodyText: Also not sure what caused this change in plan.
timeline.author: vineetgarg02
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6115,32 +6112,39 @@ WHERE "d_year" = 1999 AND "d_moy" BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND "d_date_sk" IS NOT NULL) A
             Reduce Operator Tree:
               Merge Join Operator
                 condition map:
-                     Anti Join 0 to 1
+                     Left Outer Join 0 to 1

replies.bodyText: This change is not actually related to this patch. Note that the test was disabled by default (HIVE-23910); it seems maybe a preliminary version of HIVE-23716 changed these q files and it should have not.
replies.author: jcamachor
